recipe.title: 30-Minute Chili

recipeinfo.blurb: An easy to make, mild chili recipe.
recipeinfo.author: David Horton

ingredientlist.ingredient: 100 gr. beef stew meat cut into bite-sized pieces
5 oz. Brooks chili hot beans, drained

recipe.preparation: Add olive oil, garlic and onion to a 4-quart saucepan. Sweat onion and garlic for a few minutes over medium-low heat. Add beef, chili powder, cumin and cayenne pepper. Raise heat to brown the meat slightly. Add crushed tomatoes, beans, salt and sugar. Reduce heat to a low simmer. Cook for at least 20 minutes before serving, much longer if time permits.
recipe.serving: Top with Chihuahua cheese and sour cream. Serve with cornbread.
recipe.notes: Lean ground beef may be used in place of stew meat.
